Development.dev:debug: Build WASM in debug mode then start dev server
Development.dev:all: Run Vite dev server and Docusaurus server
Development.dev:all:debug: Build WASM in debug mode then start dev and Docusaurus server

Build.build: Build WASM then build the site
Build.build-wasm:debug: Build WASM modules in debug mode

Cleaning.clean: Clean WASM build artifacts and dist folder

Formatting.format: Format all files with Prettier and clang-format
Formatting.format-js: Format all non-C++ files with Prettier
Formatting.format-wasm: Format all C++ files with clang-format

Linting.lint: Run ESLint to check for code issues
Linting.lint:fix: Run ESLint and automatically fix issues

Testing.test: Run all tests once using Vitest
Testing.test:watch: Run tests in watch mode with Vitest
Testing.test:coverage: Run tests and generate a coverage report

Release.release: Generate and update changelog, then handle release versioning

Other.docs: Run docs scripts (use `npm run docs help` to see available commands)

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev" "npm run docs start"
scripts.dev:all:debug: concurrently "npm run dev:debug" "npm run docs start"
scripts.clean: npm run clean-wasm && npm run clean-js
scripts.format: npm run format-js && npm run format-wasm
